title: The revengeful queen a tragedy : as it was acted at the Theatre-Royal by His Majesty's servants / written by William Philips, Esq.
author: Philips, William, d. 1734.
notes: On the same story as D'Avenant's Albovine, but independent of it. Cf. p. [6] of the dedication.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
